quest.name: Sisterly Concern
journal:
 Quest Sync
The restless hunter is scanning the horizon.

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: Excuse me, misssir, have you seen a tall, skinny Hume girl on your travels?

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: ...No? Do you think you might lend a hand in finding her, then? She has a terrible habit of wandering away when left to her own devices─not the safest pastime when you consider the wildlife around here.

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: I'll start looking near the Ladder, but it would make me feel better if I knew someone was searching along the cliff at the same time. Would you do that for me?

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: Thank you! I've seen her walk off to the southeast before, so you might want to try that way first. If you do find her, please send her back to Amity!

dialogue.name: FRIEND03545
dialogue.text: Oh, thank you! Thank you, uh... Who are you?

dialogue.name: FRIEND03545
dialogue.text: ...Ah. Sent you to find me, did she? My little brother lives down there, you see, and this place offers the best view of Gatetown.

dialogue.name: FRIEND03545
dialogue.text: I'd wanted us to leave together─to give up on being chosen─but he'd become obsessed with the idea of Eulmore. And when I heard about the fighting and such, I got so worried...

dialogue.name: FRIEND03545
dialogue.text: And now here I am, causing the same kind of worry for my neighbors. My apologies─I'll be more careful in the future.

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: My friend came back safe and sound, saying how she was saved by a stranger. I assume that was you!

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: She seemed...less brooding than usual. What did you two talk about?

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: ...I never knew she had a brother. Many here have lost their families─maybe that's why she thought to keep it secret.

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: But now that things in Eulmore have changed, we shouldn't have to creep around the lowlands like thieves anymore. She'll be able to visit her brother openly! No more stealing away to peer over cliffs!

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: Who knows, maybe I'll even go along. She might need company on the road, and what else are friends for?

dialogue.name: HUNTER03545
dialogue.text: Aye, I think I'll have a word with her right now. Thank you again, misssir!
